title: Translation of "medicina alopática" into English
description: Check 'medicina alopática' translations into English. Look through examples of medicina alopática translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar.
cleaned_text: Translation of "medicina alopática" into English allopathic medicine is the translation of "medicina alopática" into English. Sample translated sentence: Varios hospitales del país dispensan servicios de medicina tradicional además de la medicina alopática Traditional medicine is now offered alongside allopathic alopática Spanish-English dictionary - allopathic medicinenoun Varios hospitales del país dispensan servicios de medicina tradicional además de la medicina alopática.
